TopicTitle: My attempt at creating a TIE Fighter.

Articles.Content:
I was bored, so I decided to create a TIE Fighter with my beginner spacecraft building skills.

Has a tendency to slightly go up every time you turn/rotate.

Well, at least I tried!

Trying to fly it is the hard though, as you need to speed up using the jet engines first, and when you're halfway through the runway you activate the radial engines to get it up. And I haven't thought of how to land it yet. ^^"

Hmm, maybe a VTOL landing?

Very nice work!

Hmm, maybe a VTOL landing?

Very nice work!

Thank you! I'll improve it tomorrow, exams have ended and the holidays have just started!
